column2: Monthly Active Users MAUs. We define a monthly active user as a registered and logged-in Facebook user who visited Facebook through our website
or a mobile device or used our Messenger application and is also a registered Facebook user in the last 30 days as of the date of measurement. MAUs
are a measure of the size of our global active user community on Facebook.
As of March 31 2020 we had 2.60 billion MAUs an increase of 10 from March 31 2019. Users in India Indonesia and the Philippines represented key

column1: sources of growth in the first quarter of 2020 relative to the same period in 2019.
